dagger.android

Class AndroidMemorySensitiveReferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dagger.android.AndroidMemorySensitiveReferenceManager

  • @Beta
public final class AndroidMemorySensitiveReferenceManager
extends Object
    Releases references in ReleaseReferencesAt scopes in low-memory conditions.

    In order to release references in low-memory conditions, inject an AndroidMemorySensitiveReferenceManager into your Application and delegate Application.onTrimMemory(int) to it.

    For example: 

       class MyApplication extends Application {
      @Inject AndroidMemorySensitiveReferenceManager manager;

     public void onTrimMemory(int level) {
       manager.onTrimMemory(level);
     }
   }
    Since:
    2.8

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTrimMemory(int level)
      Releases references for ReleaseReferencesAt scopes whose ReleaseReferencesAt.value() is less than or equal to level.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • onTrimMemory

        public void onTrimMemory(int level)
        Releases references for ReleaseReferencesAt scopes whose ReleaseReferencesAt.value() is less than or equal to level. Restores references for scopes whose ReleaseReferencesAt.value() is greater than level.
        See Also:
        Application.onTrimMemory(int)
